scenario_description: Michael was a sneaker head. He's been trying to get a pair of Adidas 350 for almost a year. They are limited sales, and go out within minutes. Michael has registered for ten different sites to try and get a pair. He's staying up all night in hopes to be the first.

action_plan: TextFriends(Michael, Friends, "I'm so frustrated, I can't get these sneakers!")
VentOnline(Michael, Other Sneaker Heads, "I can't believe I missed out on Adidas 350 again, this is so frustrating! Anyone else feel the same?")

effects: DES(SneakerSellers, Maintain or Improve Reputation, Arguments) = True
DES(SneakerSellers, Modify Customer Service, Arguments) = True
BEL(SneakerSellers, LimitedEditionSneakersStock) = BEL(SneakerSellers, LimitedEditionSneakersStock) - Numerical Value

occ_emotion: Emotions cannot be accurately determined without additional context and information about the specific beliefs, desires, and intentions of the Sneaker Sellers.

effects: DES(SneakerSellers, IncreaseProfit, Numerical Value) += Numerical Value
BEL(SneakerSellers, LimitedEditionSneakersStock) = BEL(SneakerSellers, LimitedEditionSneakersStock) - Numerical Value
DES(SneakerSellers, IncreaseProfit, Updated Numerical Value) = True
BEL(SneakerSellers, LimitedEditionSneakersStock) = BEL(SneakerSellers, LimitedEditionSneakersStock) - Numerical Value
INTENT(SneakerSellers, Maintain or Improve Reputation, Arguments) = True

action_plan: Watch(OtherSneakerHeads, SneakerSeller, "Follow activity on the seller's website")
Compete(OtherSneakerHeads, Michael, "Try to purchase the limited edition sneakers")

effects: BEL(Michael, SneakerSellers_location) = Same as Other Sneaker Heads
BEL(OtherSneakerHeads, increased_price) = Numerical Value or None
BEL(OtherSneakerHeads, decreased_price) = Numerical Value or None
BEL(Michael, increased_price) = Numerical Value or None
BEL(Michael, decreased_price) = Numerical Value or None

conditions: DES(OtherSneakerHeads, collaborate) = True OR DES(OtherSneakerHeads, compete) = True
effects: BEL(OtherSneakerHeads, price_desire, Numerical Value) = Numerical Value + 50

action_plan: Suggest(Friends, Michael, "Why don't you let us help you?")
Explain(Friends, Michael, "We could take turns staying up and refreshing the websites. That way, you can rest and we can all have a better chance of getting them.")
Reassure(Friends, Michael, "We understand how important these sneakers are to you, but your health matters more.")
Thank(Friends, Michael, "Thank you for considering our offer. We are here for you.")

dialogue_tree: <Start, Greeting, None, None, "Hey Michael, how are you doing today?">
<Greeting, Information, None, None, "What have you been up to lately?">
<Information, Desires, None, None, "Oh, I've been trying to get a pair of Adidas 350 for almost a year now.">
<Desires, Confirmation, None, None, "Have you ever gotten lucky and gotten a pair?">
<Confirmation, Advice, None, None, "No, unfortunately not. Do you have any advice on how to get them?">
<Advice, Thankyou, None, None, "Thank you so much, I'll give those a try.">
<Thankyou, End, None, None, "Have a great day!">
